trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around August 29th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsFriends and family sit in my drive often and watch the sky. The first time I was alone. The second my friend also witnessed the craft. The third time I was alone again.The fourth time my daughter sighted it. Multiple events and directions and speeds. We lose sight due to treeline.I was exited but not disturbed. I have experience in aviation and rocketry. I can't identify the craft. Estimated speed of of over 700,000 mph. No sound. No boom. Must be very slippery.
Summary: seen paceing an airliner out of Chicago
